error.invalid_input_format: 入力データが無効です

error.unable_to_parse_profile_data: これはプロフィールデータ専用です。集音履歴データは別のインポートボタンを使ってください。
error.download_failed: ダウンロードに失敗しました
error.client_log_required: Client.logファイルをアップロードしてください！
error.cannot_find_convene_url: ConveneのURLが見つかりませんでした
error.cannot_find_convene_url_description: 履歴を開くときにClient.logが更新されていることを確認してください。更新されていない場合は、トラブルシューティングセクションを参照してください。
error.convene_url_expired: URLの有効期限が切れている可能性があります。もう一度インポートしてください。
error.use_valid_player_id: まず有効なアクティブプレイヤーIDを使用してください
error.no_profile_to_download: ダウンロードするプロフィールがありません。
error.sync_no_pulls_to_upload: You don't have any pulls to upload.
error.sync_unavailable: Unable to sync at the moment.
error.sync_no_remote_data_to_download: You don't have any remote data to download.
error.incorrect_input_file_description: This is for new pull history format imports ONLY!
error.files_max_upload_num: You can only upload up to {num} file(s).
error.files_has_oversize_limit_num: Some files exceed the size limit of {num}MB.
error.you_must_use_a_non_guest_profile_to_expo: You must use a non-guest profile to export your pull history
error.failed_to_fetch_pulls_from_database: Failed to fetch pulls from our database
error.an_error_occured_while_merging_your_data: An error occured while merging your data
error.your_email_must_be_linked_to_import_pull: Your email must be linked to import pulls
Please log in and link your player ID first.

support.troubleshooting_description: If you are experiencing issues with importing, consult our troubleshooting guide here.

import.log_files_missing_q: The script says "install location not found or log files missing" — what should I do?

import.ps5_player_import_q: Can I import as a PlayStation 5 player?
import.other_q: My problem doesn't seem to be here — what should I do?

migration.legacy_migration: Upgrade your old pulls to the new format here

data.title: Data

connections.title: Connections
connections.active_email_description: This is the active email you're currently logged in with
connections.linked_user_id_description: This is the user ID linked to your active email
connections.link_your_email_description: Unlock more features by linking your Wuthering Waves player ID to your email
connections.unlink_email_confirm_description: You will lose access to various site features. To proceed, please type to confirm.
connections.cloud_pull_data_description: You can recover your pull data from our database if your email is linked

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.website_version_description: You're currently using this version of the site
advanced.session_logs_description: You can download your logs for debugging purposes
advanced.delete_active_profile_data_description: You can delete your active website profile data, ONLY including all associated non-pull data.
advanced.delete_active_profile_data_confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete {activeProfileId}'s Data?
advanced.delete_active_profile_data_confirm_descr: All associated data for will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
advanced.enable_beta_features_description: Opt-into new features before they're officially released

timeline.choose_server_timezone_description: Show times adjusted to your local time zone
timeline.timeline_description: View Wuthering Waves events in your local timezone or in other <link>Server Times</link>.

reset_timers.title: Server Daily Reset Timers
reset_timers.description: Compare your local time to the Wuthering Waves game servers to plan your next adventure.
reset_timers.disclaimer: Other server timers are displayed in their local time.

import.follow_our_video_tutorial_description: This short video will guide you through the import process
import.we_will_search_your_logs_and_extract_the: We'll search your logs and extract the import URL for you
import.logs_not_updating_alert_description: As of January 14, 2025, PC users have been experiencing logging issues with their game due to a suspected update from Kuro Games. Read our <link>Troubleshooting Guide</link> to debug it.
import.first_open_game_history: まず始めにゲームを起動し、集音履歴画面を開く
import.open_windows_powershell_and_run_script: 次に「Windows PowerShell」を起動し、以下のコマンドを貼り付けて実行する。
import.click_the_copy_button: Click the copy button on the right
import.powershell_script_disclaimer: 注意: このスクリプトはファイルの編集はせず、ログからURLを取得するだけです。スクリプトの内容は <link>こちら</link> で確認できます。
import.go_to_installation_directory: ゲームのインストール先ディレクトリを開く
import.go_to_installation_directory_description: ランチャーを右クリックして ファイルの場所を開く を選択してください。すると launcher.exe やたくさんの .dll ファイルが見えるはずです。
import.search_for_log: Client.logファイルを探してここにアップロードする
import.download_ascent: Download and use Ascent to get your gacha history URL
import.download_ascent_description: Similar to getting your history in Genshin Impact or Honkai Star Rail, follow this <link>guide by Mirai0009</link>to download and use <ascent>Ascent v2.1.6</ascent> to get your URL.
import.download_ascent_disclaimer: NOTE: This method only supports Android versions 11 and above.
import.download_ascent_troubleshooting: If it's not working properly, check the <link>troubleshooting section</link>.
import.ios_follow_tutorial_video_description: Similar to getting your history in Genshin Impact or Honkai Star Rail, follow this video tutorial to import your data on iOS.
import.ios_certificate_disclaimer: NOTE: You must use Safari when downloading the certificate file. Other browsers like Google Chrome may not work.
import.ps5_credits: Special thanks to <link></link> for sharing the methodology & images for this PlayStation 5 tutorial.
import.ps5_press_the_options_button: Press the Options button on your controller
import.open_terminal_and_open_script: Afterwards, open your terminal, and then paste the following script:
import.linux_script_disclaimer: The script does not edit your files, it simply extracts your Convene History URL from your game logs. You can view the script <script>here</script>. Credits to <author></author> for sharing their <repo></repo> code.
import.script_disclaimer: The script does not edit your files, it simply extracts your Convene History URL from your log files.
import.email_link_description: This will enable us to save your data to our database & automatically back up your data every time you import. If your player ID is already linked to another email address, we will remove the old link and use your new email address.

inventory.no_active_plans: You don't have any active plans.
inventory.plan_delete_name_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the {name} plan?

home_page.hero_subheading: WuWa Tracker is your ultimate resource & companion app for Wuthering Waves, using the up-to-date data with global statistics and more. Use our various tools to enhance your gameplay experience!
home_page.keep_up_with_the_latest_news: Keep up with the latest news
home_page.quick_links_description: Access important pages and features quickly

root.description: 最新のデータとグローバル統計を使用したウーザリングウェーブスのピティカウンター。データをデバイス間で同期し、引き分け結果を友達と共有し、アカウントを簡単に追跡できます！

achievements.title: 実績
achievements.page_header: Track your in-game achievements and view all the rewards you've earned so far
achievements.description: 鳴潮での実績を追跡し、複数のデバイス間で自由にインポート＆エクスポート！最新のデータと世界の統計情報などを使用する鳴潮集音カウンター WuWa Tracker です。ガチャ履歴や実績を追跡し、友達と共有しましょう！

index.title: Pull Tracker
index.description: View your updated Wuthering Waves pull statistics and recent Convenes. Use screenshot-ready dashboards to brag to your friends! WuWa Tracker pity counter for Wuthering Waves, using the up-to-date data with global statistics and more. Share your pulls with your friends and track your account!

global.title: グローバル統計
global.description: View global pull statistics for the {currentBanner} banner, featuring {currentFeaturedResonator}! Use screenshot-ready dashboards to brag to your friends! WuWa Tracker pity counter for Wuthering Waves, using the up-to-date data with global statistics and more. Share your pulls with your friends and track your account!
global.banner_description: View global pull statistics for the {name} banner. WuWa Tracker pity counter for Wuthering Waves, using the up-to-date data with global statistics and more. Share your pulls with your friends and track your account!

error.title: エラーが発生しました．
error.description: WuWa Trackerを使用中にエラーが発生しました．Discordサーバーに通報し、即解決するようにお願いします

import.title: 集音履歴のインポート
import.page_header: Select your platform & preferred method to import your data
import.description: 操作しやすいチュートリアルに従って、鳴潮での統計情報を確認しましょう。PC、Android、iOS、どちらもサポートしています。最新のデータと世界の統計情報などを使用する鳴潮集音カウンター WuWa Tracker です。ガチャ履歴や実績を追跡し、友達と共有しましょう！

not_found.title: ページが見つかりません
not_found.description: WuWa Tracker にこのページは見つかりませんでした。集音履歴を追跡するにはホームページにお戻りください。

privacy_policy.title: プライバシーポリシー
privacy_policy.description: This privacy policy document outlines the types of personal information that is received and collected by WuWa Tracker and how it is used. WuWa Tracker is a pity counter for Wuthering Waves, using the up-to-date data with global statistics and more.

settings.title: 設定
settings.page_header: Manage your site preferences and data here
settings.description: Googleアカウントでサインインしてデータを同期し、ガチャ履歴を管理しましょう。最新のデータと世界の統計情報などを使用する鳴潮集音カウンター WuWa Tracker です。ガチャ履歴や実績を追跡し、友達と共有しましょう！

terms_and_conditions.title: 利用規約
terms_and_conditions.description: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of WuWa Tracker's website and services.

manage_cookies.title: Manage Cookies
manage_cookies.description: You can update your cookie preferences at any time to control how we collect and use your data, in compliance with privacy regulations like GDPR and CCPA.

timeline.title: イベントスケージュール
timeline.page_header: Stay updated with the latest events and activities in Wuthering Waves
timeline.description: 現地、或いは各サーバーのタイムゾーンを使用して、すべてのガチャ、イベント、逆境深塔＆深層空想秘境の期間を一つの場所で確認できます。最新のデータと世界の統計情報などを使用する鳴潮集音カウンター WuWa Tracker です。ガチャ履歴や実績を追跡し、友達と共有しましょう！

resonator.title: 共鳴者
resonator.description: View Wuthering Waves Resonator information, profiles, and use WuWa Tracker's material calculator to plan your Resonator upgrades. WuWa Tracker pity counter for Wuthering Waves, using the up-to-date data with global statistics and more. Share your pulls with your friends and track your account!

item.title: アイテム
item.description: View Wuthering Waves item information, drop locations, and track your inventory - all in one place. WuWa Tracker pity counter for Wuthering Waves, using the up-to-date data with global statistics and more. Share your pulls with your friends and track your account!

weapon.title: 武器
weapon.description: View Wuthering Waves weapon information, attributes, and track your inventory - all in one place. WuWa Tracker pity counter for Wuthering Waves, using the up-to-date data with global statistics and more. Share your pulls with your friends and track your account!

planner.title: Ascension Planner
planner.description: The most powerful Wuthering Waves calculator for planning your Resonator Ascension level, skill, and EXP materials!

support.title: Support
support.description: Need help with downloading your Wuthering Waves pull data? Want to know how WuWa Tracker uses your data? View WuWa Tracker's FAQ here!

articles.title: Articles
articles.description: Read the latest articles and updates about Wuthering Waves, including guides, tips, news, announcements and more!

links.Privacy Policy: プライバシーポリシー
